title: Barcodes
description: Displays statistics on reads and bases associated with individual barcodes.

columns.description: A string containing the pair of barcode indices for which the following metrics apply, or a 0 if not barcoded. The barcode entries are represented as a pair of dash-separated number, with each number representing one of the two barcodes used for that amplicon.
The number of reads associated with the barcode.
The number of bases associated with the barcode.
